oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Analysis of Regulatory Framework affecting Sensory Properties of Organic Products
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schmid, Otto
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Consumer issues
Quality and evaluation of inputs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This report provides a synthesis of the analysis of regulatory framework affecting sensory properties. The main focus of the analysis was on the most relevant differences between the EU rules for organic production, governmental rules and private standards, which are relevant for sensory properties.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Schmid, Otto (2009) Analysis of Regulatory Framework affecting Sensory Properties of Organic Products. Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL), Frick, Switzerland.
